question: Which institution is to provide USD 500-million loan to India for building green national highway corridors?
explanation:
The Indian Government and World Bank signed an agreement on USD 500-million project, to build safe and green national highway corridors.
According to the Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, the highway corridors will be developed in the states of Himachal Pradesh, Rajasthan, Uttar Pradesh and Andhra Pradesh. Under the Green National Highways Corridors Project, 783 km of highways will be developed.
